text:
Rashida Hamid also known as Rashida Khanom is a Bangladeshi public figure, 8th First Lady of Bangladesh and the wife of President Abdul Hamid. Rashida serving as the country's 8th Lady from 23 April 2013.
Biography.
Rashida was born at Jafrabad, Karimganj. Her father name is Abdul Halim Khan. Rashida completed her graduation from Gurudayal Government College. In 1964 Rashida was married to Abdul Hamid. They have 3 son and 1 daughter together.
Rashida was heading a kindergarten school as the head teacher since Abdul Hamid became the speaker.
